animeTitle: Bishoujo Yuugi Unit Crane Game Girls
otherNames: Crane Game Girls, 美少女遊戯ユニットクレーンゲール Crane Game Girls
synopsis: The series follows three girls aspiring to become idols while also working part time at a game center. Little do they know that, in reality, they are gathered by a mysterious organization to protect the Earth from a large meteorite.
